doc:
Charles Howerton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Howerton 0 Charles Howerton is an American actor best known for such films and television series as The Black Gestapo, Eat My Dust, Up from the Depths, Smokey Bites the Dust, Dr. Heckyl and Mr. Hype, G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra, Wolfen, Assassination and The Iron Giant.Howerton was married to actress Linda Gary until Gary's death in October 1995. They married on December 21, 1967 and had two daughters, Dana and Alexis. Linda Gary was also stepmother to Howerton's daughter from his previous marriage, Lynn Howerton. Charles_Howerton is an_American_actor best_known for such_films_and_television_series as The_Black_Gestapo , Eat My_Dust , Up from the_Depths , Smokey_Bites the_Dust , Dr._Heckyl and Mr._Hype , G.I._Joe : The_Rise of Cobra , Wolfen , Assassination and The_Iron_Giant.Howerton was_married to actress_Linda_Gary until Gary 's_death in October_1995 . They married on December_21_,_1967 and had two_daughters , Dana and Alexis . Linda_Gary was also stepmother to Howerton 's_daughter from his_previous_marriage , Lynn_Howerton .
